properties.name: constants.storage-path
properties.description: The storage path used to save files and data.

properties.name: constants.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: The secret key used to sign and verify JWT (JSON Web Tokens).

properties.name: constants.jwt.time-expiration
properties.description: The expiration time of the JWT token in milliseconds.

properties.name: constants.jwt.time-refresh
properties.description: The refresh time of the JWT token in milliseconds.
